LNG.FailedRecordAtDb: Failed to record at data base.
LNG.InvalidLogin: The login must contain only English letters and numbers, without spaces or special characters.
LNG.InvalidPassword: The password cannot be empty and must contain at least 5 characters.
LNG.InvalidRegisLogin: The login cannot be empty and cannot exceed 35 characters.
LNG.InvalidRegisPassword: The password must contain a minimum of 6 characters and a maximum of 10.
